definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Continuous testing encompasses both breadth and frequency.
sentences.chinese: 持續測試包括了廣度和頻度。

sentences.english: We will constantly deepen and expand cooperation between Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macao.
sentences.chinese: 不斷拓展粵港澳三地合作的深度和廣度。

sentences.english: Attempts to increase the attention span of executives by using incentives have failed.
sentences.chinese: 通過獎勵措施來延長高管們注意廣度的嘗試並不成功。

sentences.english: A network topology discovery algorithm based on breadth-first is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種基於廣度優先的網絡拓撲發現算法。

sentences.english: Therefore, only when we attain Buddhahood, can we perfectly help all beings in the universe.
sentences.chinese: 因此，一定要成佛道，才能夠廣度九法界一切衆生。

sentences.english: Sodalite is holding the vibration of magnitude in the language of light.
sentences.chinese: 方鈉石持有光之語中廣度的振動。

sentences.english: Children'persistence was associated positively with distraction.
sentences.chinese: 注意廣度與持久性與分心正相關顯著。

sentences.english: Definitions of self-esteem vary in their breadth and sophistication.
sentences.chinese: 對自尊的各種定義區別在於廣度和複雜度上。

sentences.english: The scope of man's use of natural resources will steadily grow.
sentences.chinese: 人類利用自然資源的廣度將日益擴大。

sentences.english: The second algorithm is also derived from the breadth-first search method.
sentences.chinese: 第二個算法也是基於廣度優先搜索策略。

sentences.english: Another big difference is the vastness of China's economy.
sentences.chinese: 中國經濟的深度和廣度也是與日本的巨大不同。

sentences.english: You have to understand that children have short attention spans and do tire more easily.
sentences.chinese: 你要清楚，孩子的注意廣度不長，更容易感到厭倦。

sentences.english: Writing for the web means making allowance for the fact that reading patterns and attention spans are different to printed material.
sentences.chinese: 網站用戶的閱讀方式與注意廣度不同於印刷媒體用戶。

sentences.english: NIST staff and collaborators also have extended the reach of frequency combs.
sentences.chinese: NIST員工和合作者還擴展了頻率梳的廣度。

sentences.english: To thing surmounting, has manifested the thought breadth.
sentences.chinese: 對事物的超越，體現了思維的廣度。

sentences.english: A novel Unit Tree-based Breadth First Search(UTBFS) algorithm is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出基於單元樹結構的廣度優先搜索算法UTBFS。

definition: to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas
(Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
